Package io.atlasmap.spi

Interface AtlasSeparateStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAtlasSeparateStrategy
@Deprecated public interface AtlasSeparateStrategy
Deprecated.
COMBINE/SEPARATE mode has been deprecated. Use transformations with multiple field selection.
AtlasSeparateStrategy.
